item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Welcome, Cot: the Rust web framework for lazy developers (8 points | 1 comment)
2. Show HN: Live-updating version of the 'What a week, huh?' meme (422 points | 86 comments)
3. Grok3 Launch [video] (322 points | 530 comments)

6. Plane crashes, overturns during landing at Toronto airport (408 points | 459 comments)

8. New technique generates topological structures with gravity water waves (27 points | 4 comments)

10. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Mongo/React/Node Engineers ( | hide)
11. Why I'm writing a Scheme implementation in 2025: Async Rust (15 points | 2 comments)

20. Debugging an Undebuggable App (301 points | 44 comments)
21. Watch R1 "think" with animated chains of thought (227 points | 66 comments)

23. Launch HN: Roark (YC W25) – Taking the pain out of voice AI testing (54 points | 27 comments)
24. The Generative AI Con (183 points | 204 comments)
25. Show HN: TimeRetain – A browser-based personal time tracker, no sign-up needed (36 points | 14 comments)
26. You're not a senior engineer until you've worked on a legacy project (2023) (697 points | 389 comments)
27. Spacetime maps: A map that warps to show travel time (139 points | 24 comments)
28. Why Quantum Cryptanalysis is Bollocks [pdf] (99 points | 75 comments)
29. Find Your 2%Ers (2023) (118 points | 33 comments)
